g.text: Normal range for manual chit transactions
Client payment pledge for services can go up to this limit
Vendor refund/credit pledge can go to this limit
Lift in this range must be honored by Client with no charge (= honoring IOU)
Client may bump lift (-reward); This is a service to Vendor's interests
Vendor may charge or bump lift (+/- clutch); +clutch allows Vendor to retain holdings by restricting lifts
Drop in this range must be honored by Vendor at no charge (= honoring IOU)
Vendor may bump drop (-reward); This is a service to Client's interests
Client may charge or bump drop (+/- clutch); +clutch allows Client to retain holdings by restricting drops
